Clothes Hanger for Smart Homes: Create a smart clothes hanger that can connect to a home's Wi-Fi network and track the temperature, humidity, and air quality of the closet. The hanger can also detect when an item of clothing is taken out or put back, and can automatically adjust the temperature and humidity levels to preserve the clothing's condition.

Virtual Closet: Develop an app that allows users to virtually organize and manage their closet. Users can take a photo of their clothes using their smartphone, and the app will create a virtual closet with detailed information about each item, including the brand, size, and color. Users can then search for specific items, see what's missing, and even make virtual outfits.

Sustainable Clothes Hanger: Design a reusable and biodegradable clothes hanger made from natural materials like bamboo or cornstarch. The hanger can be washed and reused multiple times, reducing the amount of plastic waste generated by traditional clothes hangers.

Clothes Hanger with Built-In Ironing Board: Create a clothes hanger with a built-in ironing board, making it easier for users to iron their clothes without having to take them off the hanger. The ironing board can be folded up when not in use, saving space in the closet.

AI-Powered Clothes Hanger: Develop a clothes hanger with built-in AI technology that can analyze the fabric and texture of each item of clothing and provide personalized care instructions, such as the best temperature for ironing or the most effective cleaning method. The hanger can also suggest outfit combinations based on the user's preferences and body type.
